name: AKUNEKO PANIC!
description:
• PLUG N' PLAY! Connect your controller(s) and press any button to begin!
  • YOUR TURN! Don't get skipped! Choose a direction and either hop or...
  • GOTCHA! Use your tongue to zip around quickly or pull sushi to you!
  • YUM! Collect all 5 sushi rolls to complete the floor, but...
  • BEWARE THE CATS! If you get too close, they'll get angry!
  • LEVEL UP! Sushi restores your HP and raises your EXP!
  • PANIC! The pace of the game increases every floor! Can you reach the top?

More information can be found in the README.txt file (located in the same directory as the game's executable).
